SEARCH
Package Screen

Class MineScreen

java.lang.Object
Screen.Screen
Screen.MineScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
jay.jaysound.JayLayerListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
NormalMine, RichMine
public class MineScreen extends Screen
The screen where the player is able to mine blocks Can get new tools when clicked on chest Can lose coins when clicked on bomb Can navigate to different screens

  • Field Summary

    • MineScreen

      Parameters:
      surface - A surface that allows the MineScreen to be drawn to
      stats - A StatsScreen object that is shared among classes
      g - The character that is drawn onto the screen, shared among all classes
